<<<<<<< HEAD
To all the noble and warlick nations of Great Brittain Ponteus, John.
The tenth edition.
4 p.
s.n., [London : 1656]
Caption title. A1r signed: John Puntæus; at foot of A1r: The tenth edition. Caption title at head of p. 2: The artificial balsamum for new wounds, cold aches, strains, bruises, gouts, &c. As it was made publickly upon Smithfield place before many hundreds of good people the 20, and 21. of October, 1651. By John Puntæus, a chymical physician. Pages stained with some loss of print. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
